CANDIDATE 		Serafin Zafra Garcia
PERSONAL DETAILS
Location:		Spain – Madrid
QUALIFICATIONS
E-Learning Marketing Excellence Survey, Marketing Knowledge and Marketing Attitudes 2015 – University of Oregon 2015
The Marketing Excellence Survey (MES) was developed by Dr. Roger J. Best, Emeritus Professor of Marketing at the University of Oregon, and is now managed by the Corporate Executive Board.
It consists of 16 chapters covering: Marketing attitudes; market analysis; marketing mix strategies, strategic marketing and marketing profitability.
MSc Water and Wastewater Engineering – Cranfield University 2011
MSc Agro-industrial Plants Design & Management – Universidad de Cordoba 2010
Course of Agriculture Engineering – Mendel University Brno 2009

PERSONAL DETAILS
Location:		Spain – Madrid
QUALIFICATIONS
E-Learning Marketing Excellence Survey, Marketing Knowledge and Marketing Attitudes 2015 – University of Oregon 2015
The Marketing Excellence Survey (MES) was developed by Dr. Roger J. Best, Emeritus Professor of Marketing at the University of Oregon, and is now managed by the Corporate Executive Board.
It consists of 16 chapters covering: Marketing attitudes; market analysis; marketing mix strategies, strategic marketing and marketing profitability.
MSc Water and Wastewater Engineering – Cranfield University 2011
MSc Agro-industrial Plants Design & Management – Universidad de Cordoba 2010

Languages
Spanish - mother tongue
English – fluent
Italian – fluent

CAREER SUMMARY
2019 to date SPX Flow Inc
July 2021 to date
Position: EMEA Technical Sales Manager – UHT & SSHE
2019 to date
Position: EMEA Regional Technical Sales Manager – Heat Exchangers
Jan to July 2019
Position: EMEA Regional Product Sales Specialist – Heat Exchangers
Providing technical and commercial support for the heat exchangers within the Food & Beverage industry.
2012 to 2018 Alfa Laval
Nov 2016 to Dec 2018
Position: Global Technology Application Manager
Product Manager for THE Shell & Tube Heat Exchanger Viscoline for the food & beverage industry.
Thermal equipment product ownership in Municipal Waste. ALT Tube in Tube heat exchangers and Alfa Laval Spiral Heat Exchangers.
Aug 2012 to Oct 2016
Position: Technical Sales Engineer
The main focus of the role is to provide technical support to external customers and
the company’s External Sales Engineers (including site visits) within the Process
Industries and Food Technology segments.
The key tasks of the role are:
Design and selection of company products and process modules.
Preparation of quotations and order specifications.
Handling of customer enquiries, problems and queries.
Liaison with Project Management Department.
Monitoring and follow-up of key projects.
Development of process/application Knowledge.
2011 to 2012 Thames Water
Mar to July 2012
Position: Senior Design Estimator
This is a technical role producing robust designs and quotations that have due consideration of network and environmental management issues and are in accordance with both the business requirements and the statutory framework for service connections
The main duty is designing and pricing the provision of new clean water mains, diversions and associated new connections and abandonments to serve new developments, in accordance with customer requirements.
Key Responsibilities:
Quote for self lay and inset projects.
Prepare and issue pieces of works to the project manager ensuring that asset protection requirements and permit to work processes have been followed.
Deal with customer enquiries and liaise with other parts of the business in the effective delivery of new infrastructure, whilst protecting TW assets.
Oct 2011 to Mar 2012
Position: Design Estimator
Design and price the provision of new clean water service connections to serve new
developments, in accordance with internal and TW customers’ requirements and in
compliance with the statutory framework for service connections.
COMMENT
For further information please contact Jan Johnston on 01695 570 696 or email janj@johnston-vere.co.uk

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
